Articles.Content: Might be nice to expand on the current text. ATM if your Kerbal is in a "busy" area you have no sure way of knowing which part you are interacting with, might it be possible to draw from the parts list of a particular craft to say (e.g) "grab ladder" or "grab floodlight"? Another option might be to auto highlight the part the text refers to. Thoughts?
That's a nice idea, as you hover the pointer over the text the relevant part gets highlighted.
While not the most important thing in my own personal list, I would like to see this implemented. Clarity in a game UI is always a good thing IMHO
